name: Shift Shield
description:
An Epic Rhythm Based Action Game Meets A Platformer Bullet Hell Endless Runner, In A 1 Boss Action Packed Game, including great music and a "small" story.

WARNING:

THIS GAME IS CHALLENGING. ONLY PLAY IF YOU ARE DETERMINED TO BEAT IT!

Made For Bullet Hell Game Jam 2: https://itch.io/jam/bullet-hell-game-jam-2

Special Thanks:

Music By: waxwolf (https://open.spotify.com/artist/6y5NhL0nAvC70r4dNRlqW7?si=UaFih9OWQUGVTSbNk_1vqw )
